text: Stéphane Ravier (born 4 August 1969) is a French politician serving as a Senator for Bouches-du-Rhône since 2014. He is a member of the National Rally. ==Early life== Stéphane Ravier was born on August 4, 1969.French Senate: M. Stéphane Ravier (in French) ==Career== He has served as a member of the French Senate since 2014. He is also the Mayor of the 13th and 14th arrondissements of Marseille. ==References== ==External links== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gap, Hautes-Alpes Category:People from Marseille Category:French Senators of the Fifth Republic Category:National Rally (France) politicians Category:Senators of Bouches-du- Rhône Category:Mayors of places in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur
title: Stéphane Ravier
